participant_1.background:
I am a solitary introvert who gets along best with my pets.
both my parents were teachers.
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
my eyes are brown.
i walk three miles home every night.

participant_2.background:
My cycling collection is my most prized possession.
I should have been a farmer, growing my own beef.
i am pretty poor financially.
I started to go jogging every morning to try to lose weight.
i am going to school for writing.

content.text: Hi there. What is your name?
Hello. My name is James. What is yours?
My name is Sarah. I like to go for long runs in the park. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to go jogging every morning to try to lose weight. I am pretty poor financially, so I have been working on growing my own beef.
That is a really cool hobby. I love to cook, so growing my own beef would be awesome. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog and a cat. I love them both very much.
I love pets too! I have two dogs and a cat. They are my best friends.
That is awesome. I love animals. I think they are better than people.
I agree. Animals are so much more loving and loyal.
I am going to school for writing. I hope to be a writer someday.
That is awesome. I love to read. I hope you become a successful writer.
Thanks, Sarah. I hope so too.
It was nice talking to you, James.
It was nice talking to you too, Sarah.
